jcr:content.seoTitle: Staff | Girl Scouts of San Jacinto

text.text:
Want to spend your summer in Texas at one of GSSJC’s three great resident camps?

GSSJC is hiring staff for all three resident camps. Positions include unit counselors, waterfront staff, riding and sailing staff and nurses. Salaries include meals and lodging. Download the Resident Camp Staff Information for the official camp dates, job descriptions and starting weekly salaries. You must be at least 18 years old by the start of camp, or be at least 17 years old and have completed the GSSJC CIT (Counselor in Training) program in a previous summer.

Ready to apply? Fill out the online application. You will need to fill out the application in its entirety. When you reach the last screen of the application, you should have five green check marks and have clicked “submit”. The system will send you an email and ask you to click on a link provided in order to complete your application. Once complete, Insperity will pass your application over to GSSJC for review.

You will also need to complete a GSSJC Criminal Background Check Form and also have three non-relatives complete a reference for you using this Resident Camp Staff Reference Form.

Completed reference and CBC forms can be returned to: GSSJC, Attn: Jamie Williams, 3110 Southwest Fwy., Houston, TX 77098; faxed to 713-292-0342, Attn: Jamie Williams; or emailed to residentcamp@sjgs.org.

For questions, email residentcamp@sjgs.org or call 713-292-0224. We look forward to seeing you at camp this summer! Please allow one week after application submission for the camp director to contact you.
